extendedInfo.description: Can't figure out what the other person is drawing in Draw Something 2?  Use Draw Cheat (or Something) to help you figure out that scribbled mess!â Supports Draw Something, Draw Something 2, and Paint for Friends (Configurable in the settings).â Powerful overlay mode makes it easy to enter your letters while playing the game.â Long click a word to translate it to your native language.â In-app upgrade removes all advertising.This app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc or Games for Friends GmbH, makers of the popular games Draw Something and Paint for Friends respectively.

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app is a life saver when trying to guess drawings from people \"Who Can\'t Draw\"!! Lol
reviews.author: Cheri Earp

reviews.title: Helpful for 3 year old drawers
reviews.comment: (There are surprisingly a lot of them.. !)
reviews.author: Tao Scott

reviews.title: Hate to cheat
reviews.comment: But some times you just get stuck and you don\'t want to look like an idiot, so I just call it seeking help. It works real well.
reviews.author: Lorie White

reviews.title: suggestion
reviews.comment: i need transparency in word list page
reviews.author: Hardik Lakhalani

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Have a few people that I play with that just can\'t draw.  This way I can get the word without hurting their feelings lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs a bigger word base.
reviews.comment: Its a good help but doesn\'t always have the answers you need. Needs more words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Very good app. Easy to use and its the best one out there. Needs nothing else
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bleh
reviews.comment: It works yea, but it pauses my music and puts notifications in my notification bar
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Only thing is maybe only use words from.draw something ..like idk who.adele is..maybe add the celeb words too?!? Plz and 5 stars!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The word was, its a good game!
reviews.comment: I am dissapointed. This app is a great start, but gives you so many options- I mean sure 2-3 is fine, but mine gives me 25! I changed it to a 3 because i use it alot. But the swith to game button doesnt work and that would be really helpful. But i really think its a good idea, and I still have hope in you guys to make this the best app on the market, well, for cheats at least,;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great when you\'re stuck.
reviews.comment: I\'ve only used out a couple times in the months I\'ve had it but it\'s saved some good games from bad drawings.
reviews.author: Katie Shuckhart

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Works great, love it. Easiest one I have used because of overlay feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very helpful!!!!!
reviews.comment: This is great for those words you just can\'t figure out. I only use it if I racked by brain and can\'t think of the answer. It has saved me from messing up a 300+ turn game more than once. You still have to think though..It gives alot of choices.   : )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This application is good but it\'s not as good as the one I used on my iPhone.. this one gives u a lot of words which u have scroll down n choose
reviews.author: Reyya Al Said

reviews.title: Marikha
reviews.comment: Its really fun and useful  Here\'s how u play 1. You pick how many words there are  2. You put the persons user name on the line 3. Press enter 4. Then it gives u multiples of words      It really works I\'m not lying  Try it
reviews.author: Marikha Mehu

reviews.title: Unsure.
reviews.comment: I like the app. Its good, its fast and in most cases accurate. My only problem is, sometimes it doesn\'t have the words I want to guess. For example, names of characters or celebrities. Could you update the words on the system?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is really good whenever I cant figure out a sloppy drawing and dont feel like ruining a streak its here to help however this app didnt show everyword I need and it would be easier if this app could be attached.inside the drawsomething game instead having to exit the game everytime I need help but otherwise this app is good :)
reviews.author: A Google User
